body_html:
@skye Sorry for the delayed response but I was traveling. That sounds reasonable, although it raises two questions: 1) should I go with the C API for the gradient support too, and 2) if I do so, when is it expected for the C++ gradients to be exposed to the C API and for the complete control flow functionality to be made available (i.e., with gradients support)?

In particular, I wrote some bindings for the C API "AddGradients" function but I have no idea how to import the C++ gradients from tensorflow/cc/gradients/*_grad.cc. How should I do that from an external project, without using bazel? And why are these not used by the C API by default, since they are available?
